text: SpongeBob SquigglePants is a video game based on the television series SpongeBob SquarePants. It is the fourth game in the uDraw Series. It was published by THQ and developed by WayForward Technologies. The game was released for Wii on April 12, 2011. It was released for Nintendo 3DS on May 17, 2011. It contains over 100 mini-games that require using the uDraw GameTablet. It allows players to draw their own paintings or color in them. title: SpongeBob SquigglePants
